# tag-card-finance

















## Demos

















```html








<tag-card-finance heading="FPS Submission to HMRC" icon="CircleInfo" message="Submissions can be performed as a test. A repeat submission can be performed, which will just include any changes from the previous submission" status="warning">








    <tag-button accent="orange">Submit to HMRC</tag-button>








</tag-card-finance>








```

















<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### heading

string

Heading used to communicate action


#### icon

string

Main icon above heading


#### message

string

Details of the action


#### status

string

Identify the status of the action warning or success
